stable.title: Announcing ImageGlass 9.2.0.1208
stable.description: This update introduces Resize Image tool, improves Crop Image tool with pixel-level precision, makes WebView2 Runtime optional and supports for larger image dimensions.

kobe.title: Announcing ImageGlass 9.2.0.1208
kobe.description: This update introduces Resize Image tool, improves Crop Image tool with pixel-level precision, makes WebView2 Runtime optional and supports for larger image dimensions.
